item.title: #en @ 1438531665228439555
item.description:

Hidden data manipulation is fraud.

item.title: #en @ 1438488092537671680
item.description:
The Active Travel Open Data portal is an extensive collection of real-time cycling data and Scottish Government survey results on cycling. The data is clear, free to access and comes from a wide range of sources. #COP26 #ScotClimateWeek
